website_summaries.verdict: The best on the market. Earns top marks for its quality construction, sleek design, and many durable components.
pros: Rugged 100% stainless steel construction with 17 functional tools, including pliers, drivers, wire cutters, and multiple knives and files
Individual tools fold sleekly for easy carrying
cons: More expensive than some models with similar features, but the quality makes it worth the price

customer_reviews.title: High quality with basic tools everybody needs
customer_reviews.text: Nice to see they’ve making a tool again with the basics that the average person needs, long Phillips, straight blade in different sizes, knife blade and saw. Would like to see a swing out ruler to replace the serrated blade and a small 1/8” or less wide straight screwdriver blade to replace the stupid bottle opener nobody uses. Hope somebody at leatherman reads this, swing out ruler and small straight screwdriver would make this and awesome tool.
customer_reviews.author: T. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this model multitool for more than 5 years. I love it with a passion and refuse to use any other. It has absolutely everything I need. The phillips screwdriver is an actual screw driver and not a bit like some of the other models. I also love this it's more of a medium size multitool. It fits on my hand perfect. Doesn't feel to small or big. Definitely purchase this if you're thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ike Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Product of Quality,durability and multifunctiality
customer_reviews.text: I use it for (EDC) every day carrying multi tool. Like its larger Brother (300 Super Tool) I love the tools durability,Quality, multifunction. I like the reliable and durable locking mechanism for the saw and blades (unlike the unreliable lock mechanism on the wave and others). The Letherman use to have a life time warrenty but now has a 25 year one (still ok) AND MADE IN THE USA☺☺☺☺☺
customer_reviews.author: Ward Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone literally anyone
customer_reviews.text: My sister fiancé loves it. He is some sort of forest engineer. He goes around making sure no invasive species of plants or animals inhabit areas they shouldn’t. Saves ecosystems tests freshwater to make sure it stays fresh no dangerous algae and stuff. So long story short he uses this every day for work and says he doesn’t know how he did his job before he had it.
customer_reviews.author: Anguel

customer_reviews.title: Leatherman tool
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to beat a multi-tool like the Leatherman - the one by which others are measured! It is intended as a Christmas gift for my soon to be 10 yr old grandson. I've carried various multi-tools including Swiss Army knives, etc, but this one is my favorite - has been for work or play for over 20 years! Yes, I would definitely purchase another!.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Workman

customer_reviews.title: totally fills the niche I have..
customer_reviews.text: Very pocketable tool.. definitely closer to the size but has far more functionality of the original 90s Letterman.. I liked the wave until it started coming with those soft and lose able bits.. I'm thinking pre 2004.. last two years been using the super tool, but since it can replace a small tool box it's on the heavy side.. this fills the balance for me as a EDC item, Back uo to an actual tool box, should prove useful for bushcraft, Hunting and fishing..
customer_reviews.author: Kilo6Five

customer_reviews.title: I was upset..
customer_reviews.text: I could not find “made in USA” anywhere. My old Leatherman had it . Some research told me they were sued because the saw and corkscrew are made in Europe and the pliers are made in Mexico.. etc. they make them in Oregon. They still seem like good tools. I feel like it could be a little less expensive, but we will see if it lasts 15 years like my last one.
customer_reviews.author: weirdbeard

customer_reviews.title: Quality made, poorly designed, not safe
customer_reviews.text: This product has all the bells and whistles, but the overall feel is disappointing. The biggest problem is the two safety releases. To press the safety release button you need to grip the tool in a way where your fingers or thumb are in the way of the blade/tool's path. The lack of grips looks clean but is hard to handle. The metal edges hurt your fingers. The wire cutters blades are replaceable parts that are bolted on inside the pliers. This would be a really cool feature, but they aren't a snug fit so the blades move a bit and don't cut clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G Rhine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my dad to replace a much older Leatherman that he has had for over 20 years. It shipped quick and love that it came with a leather case you could put on your belt. As always leatherman makes quality products. Overall great price and happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought one sooner
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few multi-tools over the years. Cheap ones, you know the $9.99 Christmas specials they have on display at the big box stores? They never lasted. A friend finally convinced me to buy an actual Leatherman. Wow, what a huge difference in the quality. 25year warranty? Cant get that with those Chinese made imitation ones.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Boy RV

customer_reviews.title: Bad leather case the snap pops open unexpectantly.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the leatherman. But, was pissed as heck though because I hadn't had it that long and that snap on mine opened and I always check it after I put it back in and the snap opened while on my belt and it fell out somewhere. I was so mad.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Havens

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, subpar sheath. Rust?
customer_reviews.text: Would give a perfect review, except the stealth is low quality. The sheath wears very quickly. The tool itself is pretty great. I did start to see some rust, but cleaned it up with some CLP
customer_reviews.author: Jordan McBride

customer_reviews.title: An A1 Multitool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is absolutely amazing. I work in a structural steel fabrication shop, do smaller scale iron working, millwright, rigging, and machinery maintenance. This tool is perfect for a “jack of all trades” type of person who wants something that’s not on the bulky and heavy side, yet durable and functional enough to tackle even some of the heaviest jobs when the proper tool isn’t available. The Rebar is one of the most underrated multi tools on the market, and I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with a Leatherman!
customer_reviews.text: Leatherman makes good products. I've had other multi-tools and both of them have had tools break. This hasn't yet, but I also haven't really put it through the ringer yet. In time. I like that it's a little smaller on my belt than some others, and has everything I need for many small projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once you've had one, you can never live without on.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most useful tools you'll ever own. And there are no substitutes. The knock offs just aren't as sturdy as the original Leatherman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother as a thank you present. He loves it! Says knife and wire cutting features are the best. I am happy and he is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great tool in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: I work for a public utility and find myself needing tools in the field often. I searched for a multi tool that had wire strippers with little luck. These say the do but really don’t. I use the cutters on the pliers for stripping wires and that works well. Very good tool, sturdy, saved me lots of time.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Good all-around pocket tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for a handyman, outdoors lover, or anyone who has a "just in case" mindset. I bought one for my dad on Father's Day, and he always carries it around with him wherever he goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality item, perfect addition to any man’s belt!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband just for fun, he was always needing a screwdriver or wire cutters or something of that nature and I thought that this would be perfect for him to carry instead of a toolbox... Perfect for that. Good item for the man who has everything.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: A single tool which can serve many needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Leatherman for one of my daughters, who is a veterinarian. When she graduated from vet school several years ago I bought her a small Leatherman which she said she used it more than any other tools. At that time she was an equine surgeon. Her only regret was the Leatherman was small. Recently she has moved into a small animal practice where hopefully she will find the larger Leatherman even more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great multi tool!
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with a leatherman! These are awesome multi tools and are so useful in so many ways... camping, cutting tags, small fixes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: seamama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As always leatherman doesn’t disappoint. Highly recommend this tool. Always on my side and used constantly.
customer_reviews.author: J&CBrillon

customer_reviews.title: Leatherman-Rebar EXCELLENT Multi-Tool. Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: Leatherman-Rebar EXCELLENT Multi-Tool. Repeat buyer, but packaging was ABSOLUTELY OUTSTANDING. WHAT A PRESENTATION! AND BOX IT CAME IN IS MUST RE-USE. NETRUSH, AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: TERRENCE MARSH

customer_reviews.title: Love my Leatherman
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product! I had to order a replacement when my previous Leatherman was stolen. As my previous one was an older version, I love the locking capability this one provides to prevent tools from sliding back. It is a quality tool with a sturdy leather case. I was additionally pleased with the prompt delivery. Very satisfied customer indeed.
customer_reviews.author: mahalo808

customer_reviews.title: Has come in useful so many time
customer_reviews.text: Like a condom in college, I never leave home without it. I've swapped a garbage disposal last week using only this tool. Love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fry

customer_reviews.title: This is my every day carry
customer_reviews.text: Leatherman makes the best multi-tools available. I have several different models. The Rebar smaller and lighter than some of the others. I now make this my every day carry.
customer_reviews.author: Marcywm42

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I've had (and "misplaced") a whole bunch of leatherman tools over the years. I've had 3 or 4 different Wave models as well ... but this time I wanted something a little smaller and easier to hold. The Rebar looked like it would be the one I've been looking for, and it is. I recently used it on a fishing trip and loved how well it fit in my hands. I highly recommend this model!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome every day carry
customer_reviews.text: Never had a proper multi tool but this one is awesome. I've used almost every attachment. They all lock in to place well and haven't needed anything else when I'm in a quick pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-Tool, More Useful Than A Pocket Knife!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first multi-tool, and it can't be beat! I normally carry a small knife, but was constantly running into situations where the knife wasn't suitable for some purpose, and the Leatherman solves that problem with it's various functions. Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: dgray232

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to replace his old Leatherman that was quite old. He uses it at work many times a day and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Not completely as advertised or I didn't read the entire description!
customer_reviews.text: thought it was the full sized and it was the medium one!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor model in an otherwise great product line
customer_reviews.text: I own multiple Leatherman products, but this one is just nowhere near the quality of their others. It’s cheap stamped steel in a cheap case. By comparison their MUT model, Surge, and others are top notch. I recommend spending more to get the better tools in their product line. This one stands out as poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a leatherman. Nothing else to say they are great
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Like it's features and size the most
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality leather man product. A little tight and snug to open but that is expected on a new tool. Like it's features and size the most. Haven't used it a lot yet. Will post updates if needed.
customer_reviews.author: War eagle

customer_reviews.title: A TOOLBOX ON YOUR BELT
customer_reviews.text: CARRY IT DAILY, AND I FIND A USE -- DAILY !
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Latino

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have strong hands to open it.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works but darn is it stiff and hard to open the different functions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, I got this to put in my blind bag for hunting. That tool will cover any job while hunting
customer_reviews.author: Troy Haskett

customer_reviews.title: Quality Multi-tool with useful components
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition for my Car tool kit. Strong, durable, useful tools. More heavy duty in construction versus The Wave. I think I will get the Wave for my Emergency backpack though. I think it's easier to hold for a woman. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for my son and one for my spouse. They both immediately began using them. This was the best price I had found on this brand. It comes with a warranty however is study with a leather case that fits on a belt or flak.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks-level tool.  Not too fancy, not too cheap.  Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Just right. No need to get the wonder-gee-whiz $180 dollar Leatherman. This one does the trick, at only a small premium to the cheap Chinese knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great shop tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multi-tool. I bought it to use in a woodshop and it has proved to be just what I needed. Leatherman is a great brand, so look at the tool set and decide what you need. If you want simplicity and durability, and the rebar fits your needs toolwise, don't hesitate :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve Novak

customer_reviews.title: This one works
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this stainless steel version,I purchased the black metal one and it broke after 3 days of use.Stainlee all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these as gifts. both parties loved them. extremely well built and nice leather pouch. perfect size for carrying daily
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Great general use tool
customer_reviews.text: Great finish, opening is difficult due to tight fit, blades are sharp, wire cutter works well as does the file. Other accessories have yet to be used. Like tool so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas. He was surprised and loves it. Carries it everywhere and it has came in handy several times. Will be buying more of these in the future. Great gift for Father’s Day!
customer_reviews.author: kasey rush

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Leatherman quality stands with this product. Well made, cleanly machined, useful.
customer_reviews.author: mrentz

customer_reviews.title: excellent item
customer_reviews.text: very good it is similar to one i have been carrying for over 35 years and it is still in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these and use it daily. It is a quality product. I'm continuing to spoil my grandsons and give them this one when they have achieved becoming an Eagle Scout.
customer_reviews.author: T. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Bought for dad
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad and he loves it. Uses it constantly
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great multitool
customer_reviews.text: Great well made tool. Hundreds of uses. This was a replacement for the one that was confiscated by the TSA. I forgot it was in my carry-on bag. I replaced it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: K. O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool
customer_reviews.text: Handy little tool. Impressed with sharpness of the knives. Also locks tools in place, which is a good safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dyno

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and very useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy tool with all the assesories O need !
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic multi tool, keep one in all of our cars. Leatherman quality, and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Really like the tools on this 1 and reach of screwdrivers is a big + .Thumbs up for fit and finish
customer_reviews.author: Allen C

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good tool. I also have a Wave so its not that good but for the price its a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great multi-tool. Highly recommend. Now, if I can help my hubby from "losing" his..... Sigh....
customer_reviews.author: Steph H.

customer_reviews.title: even better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: Lost my leatherman that I had for 15 years and felt naked without it. Purchased this one and wow, even better than my old one. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing so far
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing so far. I had the very original Leatherman without any lock blades whatsoever, and this thing is such a step up from the old school days. As with all Leatherman products this thing definitely fits the bill. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good tools.  No junk.
customer_reviews.text: As close as I could find to my original, and this one is better. Bought for my son's car.
customer_reviews.author: mojoman

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the Rebar but received the Signal instead. No ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Rebar but received the Signal instead. No Sheath. This was a gift and it is disappointing. Returning product.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Use it nearly ever other day
customer_reviews.text: Def my favorite tool as an engineer & maker. Will definitely be purchasing other models in future.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Leatherman is still quality!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the one I learned on with my dad.

customer_reviews.title: POS!
customer_reviews.text: Total pos. Broke tip off serrated blade in under a weeks worth of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apparent quality
customer_reviews.text: Initial inspection a quality tool. Let you know in a while how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Telleria

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Sorry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this. I use it. I like it. Sorry, I do not have time to write much.
customer_reviews.author: OLEG

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This tool just arrived and I am dissapointed in the hand grip when using the pliers, the construction is such that when you clamp down your hand pushes in against the back of the knife blades. It’s uncomfortable to hold and apply any pressure. We sent it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Reader and shopper

customer_reviews.title: 100% as advertised. Same thing they've made for decades ...
customer_reviews.text: 100% as advertised. Same thing they've made for decades. Replaceable wire cutters give it the 5 stars... I just wish they were spring loaded pliers.
customer_reviews.author: massih zaboli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I bought one for each of my sons.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Heaps

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $$!!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the $!! Very light and heavy duty! I had a few cheap one’s before this one and now I wish I had not wasted the money on them!! And it has a 25 year Warranty....;)
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Loose tools
customer_reviews.text: This multi tool is great, but there is a huge amount of play in the tools. It wobbles back and forth while using the drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Missing AWL!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool, super disappointing that it’s missing awl and instead I have 2 of the same screwdrivers. Hmmm...

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson to use on his job.

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool as to be expected from leatherman
customer_reviews.text: Very good tool as to be expected from leatherman. I use I every day at work and its held up well.

customer_reviews.title: the tool is a little smaller than I am accustomed to using but still a good usable tool
customer_reviews.text: Did not read description completely, the tool is a little smaller than I am accustomed to using but still a good usable tool. The leather pouch with the snap closer is a plus, wish the supertool came with it, lost my last supertool do to old velcro. To bad the warranty doesn't cover that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rounded edges on handle make it comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality piece of equipment and it shows. Solid feeling click when tools are opened and locked into place, and little to zero wiggle. Nice rounded edges on handle make it comfortable to use. Small folded package, and a durable leather belt case. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a leatherman, there is no need for further description! A handy-man's must!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built as expected. Handy tool for most things ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built as expected. Handy tool for most things I'd want to do. Knife comes very sharp too. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I am happy, it's really great quality
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, I am happy, it's really great quality! Fast shipping. I recommend! Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this tool for anyone needing a “go to” multi tool.

customer_reviews.title: great for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Easier to clean than the wave or surge, great for outdoor use

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: Whats to say. Just enough tools, compact and extremely sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much the only took I use for quick fixes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the only took I use for quick fixes. I work in a field where we have to be adaptable and carrying a tool pouch, bag, or box isn't always the most convenient. Good for shanking............ oil cans.

customer_reviews.text: Good product, sturdy and good tough leather case to go with it

customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my fiancé. He LOVES it and uses it all the time. 10/10 would recommend (:

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: IS MY REBAR defective for no spring in the needle nose pliers or ichi built this way intentionally ?

customer_reviews.title: Leatherman Rebar grdat for hiking fishing Survival
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality EDC i love my Leatherman Rebar!.the only thing i disliked about my Rebar is that the Blade got scratched by just cutting CARDBOARD..how is that possible..??

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Leatherman comes through with this electricians go to knife, I carry it daily!.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool and the best value (price: quality) of all Leatherman tools.

customer_reviews.title: Handy Multitool
customer_reviews.text: Tried to find a replacement for my old PST II; while this one doesn't have all the tools of my old one, I love that the tools now lock in place.

customer_reviews.title: they look good and are very sturdy feeling
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas gifts....they look good and are very sturdy feeling....just haven't seen them used, so I can't really rate them on performance.

customer_reviews.text: As an avid horseman, I carry it with me whenever I ride. I use it to cut wire and fix and repair tack broken on the trail.

customer_reviews.text: Best thing I’ve ordered! Came in great packaging for gifting!

customer_reviews.title: Best pocket tool on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for 35 years and keep it in my vehicle always. Bought one for my grandson that was turning 16 so he would always have one too.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husband for his birthday. He loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for his birthday. He loves it but had to fix it when it arrived because one blade wouldn't lock open.
customer_reviews.author: IN Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very strange and extremely displeasing
customer_reviews.text: I love leatherman products and trust them, but much to my dissatisfaction the blade on mine came super dull. Worst than a butter knife dull. Anyways, I had to sharpen it myself, which is not something I like having to do when I’m spending so much for a product like this. Am I being too harsh giving this 2 Stars? I don’t think so. I paid good money on this and my other leathermens all had hair poppingly sharp blades. The rest of the tool seems fine so far, but only time will tell. I feel like I might have gotten a defective one....it’s really unusual
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: I l like everything aboutit. I use it in my work. Saves me time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, bought it to carry on motorcycle as a tool kit.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The blade on this is much thinner than previous versions by leatherman, not a fan of the replaceable cutter that is not covered under warranty either. The tools are somewhat difficult to open. Overall it seems it could get most jobs done.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: great tool but needs a different sheath
customer_reviews.text: the rebar is a great tool but the leather sheath that came with it does not fit, definitely 5 star if the sheath actually fit the tool

customer_reviews.title: Cheap metal in knife
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is a cheap knock off product, but the tip of my knife broke off. I would like to be contacted by the seller for a replacement. Huge disappointment from such a well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilbur

product_meta.title: LEATHERMAN, Rebar Multitool with Premium Replaceable Wire Cutters and Saw, Stainless Steel with Leather Sheath (FFP)
feature_bullets: AN ICON UPDATED: Inspired by Tim Leatherman's original PST, the Rebar features all-locking tools, 100% stainless steel construction and removable wire/hard-wire cutters
17 TOOLS IN 1: The Rebar’s bounty of tools include knives, pliers, screwdrivers, wire cutters, an electrical crimper, a wire stripper, bottle and can openers, a file, a saw, an awl and a ruler

OUR GUARANTEE: We’re proud to stand behind every product that leaves our factory in Portland, Oregon; That’s why we offer our 25-year warranty, so you can be confident your Leatherman lasts a lifetime
STRONGER DESIGN: The Rebar pliers have been optimized for strength and feature replaceable wire/hard-wire cutters—a first for a 4-inch tool from Leatherman
ALWAYS ON HAND: Compact, lightweight and made for just about any job around the house or job site, your Rebar is always within reach and ready to go
